code: var GetRequest=function GetRequest(_url){return HandleResponse(fetch(_url,{method:'get',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem('token_')}}));};var PostRequest=function PostRequest(_url,_data){return HandleResponse(fetch(_url,{method:'post',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem("token_")},body:JSON.stringify(_data)}));};var PutRequest=function PutRequest(_url,_data){return HandleResponse(fetch(_url,{method:'put',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem("token_")},body:JSON.stringify(_data)}));};var DeleteRequest=function DeleteRequest(_url,_data){return HandleResponse(fetch(_url,{method:'delete',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem("token_")},body:JSON.stringify(_data)}));};var HandleResponse=function HandleResponse(_promise){return _promise.then(function(_response){if(!_response.ok){if(_response.status===401){window.location.href='/login';return{Success:false};}return Promise.reject(_response.statusText);}return _response.json();});};export var RequestTool={GetRequest:GetRequest,PostRequest:PostRequest,PutRequest:PutRequest,DeleteRequest:DeleteRequest};
